name: SpeechSynthesisVoice.localService
description: The localService read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisVoice interface returns a Boolean indicating whether the voice is supplied by a local speech synthesizer service (true), or a remote speech synthesizer service (false.)

refs.name: Web Speech API
refs.description: The definition of 'localService' in the 'Web Speech API' specification.
